channel.title: Server Problem
channel.description:
Everytime I update my server its takes longer and longer for the character to move and suggestions on how to fix?
I dont have a server autorestarter but would that help?

item.title: Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“acesoldier, post:5, topic:112589”]No but is this good enough?

case 121: // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. // newObjects(); println_debug("Loading finished."); break;

I had it here should i remove ir from their?

public boolean process() {writePlayers();NewObjects();		// is being called regularily every 500ms

Now should i remove it from here?[/quote]

case 121: // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. // newObjects(); println_debug("Loading finished."); break;

and yes i didnt have it there i dont see why you would need to

Read full topic

item.title: Server Problem
item.dc:creator: @acesoldier acesoldier
item.description:
@acesoldier wrote:

No but is this good enough?

Just added NewObjects(); but would this work?

case 121: // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. // println_debug("Loading finished."); NewObjects(); break;

I had it here should i remove ir from their?

public boolean process() {writePlayers();NewObjects();		// is being called regularily every 500ms

Now should i remove it from here?

Read full topic
